titleStmt.title: By the Commissioners of the General Assembly of Scotland: a solemne and seasonable vvarning to all estates and degrees of persons throughout the land: for holding fast the League and Covenant with England, and avoiding every thing that may prove a snare and tentation to the breach thereof. Published according to order.
Good counsell come from Scotland
titleStmt.author: Church of Scotland. General Assembly. Commission.

titleStmt.title: By the Commissioners of the General Assembly of Scotland: a solemne and seasonable vvarning to all estates and degrees of persons throughout the land: for holding fast the League and Covenant with England, and avoiding every thing that may prove a snare and tentation to the breach thereof. Published according to order.
Good counsell come from Scotland
titleStmt.author: Church of Scotland. General Assembly. Commission.
Ker, A.

publicationStmt.publisher: First printed at Edinburgh by Evan Tyler, printer to the Kings most Excellent Majesty. And re-printed at London by John Dever & Robert Ibbitson, for John Bellamy.,

notesStmt.note: An edition of: Scotland, General Assembly, Commissioners. Good counsell come from Scotland.
Annotation on Thomason copy: "1646"; the 7 in imprint date crossed out.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

person.persName: the Kings most Excellent Majesty. And re-printed
